records.location_details: The incident involves a group of five Pakistani migrants. They crossed from Greece (Ioannina, Kalpaki) into Albania on 15/06/2023 in a redacted border area. They were apprehended by Albanian police, processed in a migrant camp in Albania, then transported to an unknown forest location and left. After returning to the camp, they were again transported on 16/06/2023 to a redacted location close to the Greek border and instructed to cross. They re-entered Greece and were apprehended by Hellenic police near a redacted village.
records.where_clear: Border area between Greece (Ioannina, Kalpaki) and Albania, including an Albanian migrant camp and a forest, and a Greek village near the border.
records.location_text_raw: border to Albania in the [REDACTED] area, migrant camp in Albania, unknown location in the middle of a forest, place close to the Greek border, re-entered Greece, where they were apprehended... by the Hellenic police near [REDACTED] village.
records.geocodable_query: Greece Albania border area near Ioannina Kalpaki
records.uncertainty_note: Specific locations within the border area, the migrant camp, and the Greek village are redacted or described generally.

possible_violations.legal_basis: Art. 4 of Protocol no. 4 of the European Convention on Human Rights

records.context_note: A group of five Pakistani migrants alleged being apprehended by Albanian police on 15/06/2023, processed in a camp, then transported to an unknown location and left. After returning to the camp, they were again transported on 16/06/2023 to a location near the Greek border and instructed to cross to Greece. The Fundamental Rights Office found it unclear if a collective expulsion occurred.
records.evidence_quote: The Fundamental Rights Office received information from Frontex operational staff about a group of migrants who alleged being apprehended by the Albanian police on 15/06/2023.
